channel.title: Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend
channel.description: A twice weekly podcast hosted by veteran interviewer and everyone's new best friend Alison Rosen (The Adam Carolla Show) featuring surprisingly honest conversations that are equal parts silly, serious, revelatory and sometimes involving a sombrero. Plus an eternal quest to find out if that thing you think or do is normal in a segment called "Just Me or Everyone?"

image.title: Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend

channel.itunes:author: Carolla Digital
channel.itunes:summary: A twice weekly podcast hosted by veteran interviewer and everyone's new best friend Alison Rosen (The Adam Carolla Show) featuring surprisingly honest conversations that are equal parts silly, serious, revelatory and sometimes involving a sombrero. Plus an eternal quest to find out if that thing you think or do is normal in a segment called "Just Me or Everyone?"

item.title: Lauren Sivan
item.description: Lauren Sivan stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about her start in broadcasting, working for Fox, working overnights, Courtney Friel's cookie party, sneakers vs. tennis shoes, pronunciations, dream jobs, losing her father at a young age, finding Libya on a map, crashing a news van, hair, twitter and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone
item.itunes:subtitle: Lauren Sivan stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about her start in broadcasting, working for Fox, working overnights, Courtney Friel's cookie party, sneakers vs. tennis shoes, pronunciations, dream jobs, losing her...

item.title: Caelan's Carb Contribution, Hearing People's Thoughts, BoBo Barking
item.description: The Thursday gang  (Alison, Chris Laxamana, Matt Fondiler, Gary Smith and Jenna Kim Jones)  discusses Caelan's Carb Contribution, driving to San Diego, vaccines and shots in general, whether the ability to hear everyone's thoughts would make you feel compassion or contempt, milk and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Jeremy Konner
item.description: Jeremy Konner (Drunk History) stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about directing, producing and co-creating Comedy Central's Drunk History, being the brother of Girls show runner Jenni Konner, growing up in a screenwriting family, his mother's stroke and subsequent six month long coma when he was seven, TV shows, being Jack Black's assistant, relationships, architects and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Alison's Website Is Making Her Crazy, Nicknames, Vacations
item.description: The Thursday gang  (Alison, Chris Laxamana, Matt Fondiler, Gary Smith and Jenna Kim Jones)  discusses family nicknames, our upcoming vacations, how we feel about talking on the phone and so much more. Also we pulled your topics out of the hat! Also Alison's website is down right now and it's making her crazy! Also we also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Matt Braunger
item.description: Matt Braunger stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about his podcast Ding-Donger with Matt Braunger, hitchhiking, love, being an only child, casting shows, therapy, relationships, commercials, stand up and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Jenna's Fry Sauce, BoBo Boys, Nut Rankings
item.description: The Thursday gang  (Alison, Chris Laxamana, Matt Fondiler, Gary Smith and Jenna Kim Jones)  discusses being reunited after Jenna's adventures, fry sauce, Daniel's thoughts on nuts, nut rankings, baking, burping and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Zhena Muzyka
item.description: Zhena Muzyka, author of Life by the Cup, stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about her journey from poor single mother to successful author, entrepreneur and activist. We discussed learning to ask for help, picking your battles, powerful women versus powerful men, her gypsy heritage, growing her Gypsy Tea company, yurts, Ojai, raising money, motherhood, book widows, tarot cards and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone
item.itunes:subtitle: Zhena Muzyka, author of Life by the Cup, stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about her journey from poor single mother to successful author, entrepreneur and activist. We discussed learning to ask for help, picking...

item.title: Alison Needs Surgery, Caelan Takes Tips, Return of Fan Phone Call
item.description: The Thursday gang  (Alison, Chris Laxamana, Matt Fondiler, Gary Smith and Jenna Kim Jones)  minus Jenna plus Mike Altier discusses Alison's frisbee/boomerang uterus, vaccines, tubas, more butter sandwich talk, Mike Altier's nutrition theory as it relates to sandwiches, the BoBo Boys, National Batman Day, tattoos and the return of fan phone call. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Jonah Ray
item.description: Jonah Ray stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about The Meltdown which premieres on Comedy Central July, 23, playing in bands, how he met Chris Hardwick and became part of Nerdist, growing up overweight, meeting his wife, comedy and stand up, guitar stores, the ladies, drinking, Vine and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone
item.itunes:subtitle: Jonah Ray stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about The Meltdown which premieres on Comedy Central July, 23, playing in bands, how he met Chris Hardwick and became part of Nerdist, growing up overweight, meeting his...

item.title: Dawson Plays the Animal Name Game, Adam Hurls a Jump Rope, Chris and Alison Can't Sleep
item.description: The Thursday gang  (Alison, Chris Laxamana, Matt Fondiler, Gary Smith and Jenna Kim Jones) minus Jenna plus Mike Dawson revisits the pill discussion while Gary pre-reads. Also we discuss Adam's jump rope attempt on Matt and Mike's life, the air conditioning fiasco of last week, manscaping, Eva Peron, Ray Donovan, Real Housewives of Orange County, Keeping up with the Kardashians, Celebrity Rehab and we introduce the animal name game. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Courtney Robertson
item.description: Courtney Robertson stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about her new book I Didn't Come Here To Make Friends: Confessions of a Reality Show Villain (about her experience winning the Ben Flajnik season of The Bachelor), the bachelor himself, dating, what it's like behind-the-scenes on a reality show, feeling betrayed by her friends, having sex on the show, the whole "skinny-dipping with a model" thing, her overprotective mother, buying dogs with her first modeling money, modeling in general, nudity, how to look good at a photo shoot and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.description: Mary Katharine Ham returns to  Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about her new hair, new baby, being referred to as a "conservative pundit," Bill O'Reilly, race on TV, Donald Sterling, birth control, childbirth, finances and name changes, makeup, pot, periods, braces, grocery stores and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Caelan Biehn, Chris's High Heels and The Weekend Conundrum
item.description: The Thursday gang (Alison, Chris Laxamana, Matt Fondiler and Gary Smith) welcome newish Carolla Digital employee Caelan Biehn -- son of actor Michael Biehn-- to the podcast while Jenna is out with a cold. We talk about Chris's weekend conundrum, who will get the honor of being Alison's Face Czar, Matt Costa and the upcoming live show at the LA Podfest, video games, the way Jo Koy says "drawers" vs. the way Chris says "drawers," dancing, super embarrassing moments, Matt's running around in flip flops and so much more.

item.title: Tom Segura
item.description: Comedian Tom Segura (Your Mom's House) stops by this episode of Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend to talk about spiders and ants, wiping technique, sneezing and whether light triggers the sneeze response, a brief stint in Boston real estate, America's Most Wanted, the Groundlings, comedy in general, how he met his lovely wife Christina Pazsitsky, cars, Theo Huxtable Segura and so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

Plus so much more. We also did a round of Just Me Or Everyone

item.title: Bald Bryan, The Cornhole Tournament and Watch Watch
item.description: Bald Bryan joined the the Thursday group (Alison, Chris Laxamana, Matt Fondiler and Gary Smith) this week as Jenna was out and we discussed Alison's continued critical timepiece situation, Chris's cornhole debacle, beards, dog parks, breakfast, bugs and so much more. We also did Topic Sombrero, a round of Just Me Or Everyone and new segment, HGFYD.
